Translations.Text: da-eum sedaeeseo jega uiloun jalo ib-e oleudolog hayeo jusoseo
chugbogbad-eun nag-won-ui sangsogjadeul jung-e han sangsogjaga doege hayeo juob soseo
jeoui abeojikke gwan-yong-eul bepul eo juobsoseo geubun-eun banghwanghaneun ja gaunde iss-eossnaida
buhwal doeneun nal bukkeuleobji anhneun jaga doege hayeo jusoseo
geunal-eun jaesando jasindo soyong i eobsneun nal-ibnida
geuleona jeongjighan ma-eum-eulo ha nanimkke oneun janeun je-oeigeoneul
jeongjighage saneun jadeul-eul wihae cheongug-i gakkai iss-eul geos-imyeo
saaghan jadeul-eul wihaeseoneun ji og-i natanal geos-ini
neohuiga sungbaehaneun sindeul-i eo di issneunyo lago geudeul-eun jilmun-eul bad eulila
hananim oee geugeosdeul-i neohui leul dobgeona seuseuloleul doul su issneunyo
i usangdeulgwa saaghan jadeul-eun meolileul ap-eulo hago boljiog-eulo deonjyeojil geos-imyeo
ibeulliseuui gundae modudo geu leohalila
geudeul-eun geu an-eseo seolo ssau myeonseo malhanani
hananim-iyeo jeohuiga sillo jal mos hayeossnaida
geuttae jeohuiga geugeos-eul man-yuui junimgwa dongdeunghan wichilo sungbaehayeossna ida
jeohuileul jalmos indohan janeun ba lo joeindeul-ieossseubnida
geulihayeo jeohuiegeneun jungjae jado eobs-eumyeo
gakkaun chingudo eobsnaida
jigeum jeohuiga dol-agal su iss neun gihuiga issdamyeon jeohuineun midneunja deul-i doeltende
sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani ha yeossdeola
sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhasim-ila
noaui baegseongdeuldo seonjijadeul eul bujeonghaess-euni
geudeul-ui hyeongje noaga geudeul-ege malhaessdeola hananim-eul dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
naneun neohuiege geue daehan bosang-eul yoguhaji anihamae sillo naui bosang-eun man-yuui junimkkeseo ju sinila
geuleona hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
geudeul-i daedabhagil gajang mi cheonhan jadeul-i ttaleugo issneun neoleul mid eulan mal-inyo
